column4: i need some help from someone who knows how to do an install on macbook pros
please pm me
can someone help me with an install on macbook pro?
im having the ATI video card error
is anyone trying to help me yet
i am trying to install ubuntu 7.04 on my macbook pro
and i am running into x windows errors
there is yes, and i guess i am aware of the problem and what i need to know how to do is
how do you get into the manual text install of unbuntu
so i can change the xserv.conf file
that takes the alternate install CD
actually yeah I just remembered how to do that
well, when you boot the graphical LiveCD, everything works except X right?
like, can you hear the drum beat?
well when I'm installing on my laptop, the driver it defaults to doesn't work so I can't see anything but it makes the drum beat noise when it gets to where the login screen should be
and then I just use Ctrl+Alt+F2 to switch into a terminal login and run sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg to switch to vesa
well then the alternate cd is probably your best bet
after you hear the startup noise that means it has booted properly and is at the GDM login screen
well then the alternate cd is probably your best bet :P
I'm not sure what they ship, but one of them might be the alternate CD, else you'd have to download an ISO
it'll give you a similar menu to the regular CD, but instead of "Start Ubuntu" or whatever it'll have "Install Ubuntu with text installer"
you're welcome
